com.solacesystems.jcsmp.impl.transaction

Class TimerSetter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.solacesystems.jcsmp.impl.transaction.TimerSetter

  • public class TimerSetter
extends Object
    Utility for setting a JCSMPTimer after sending a request and stopping it on response. We use a separate volatile flag to track whether it's valid to start the timer when start is called. This lets us avoid the race condition where the response might come in before the timer is started.
